document_data.name: ''Broken Promises''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Broken Promises''''' was a [[potion]] created by [[Auntie Ethel]] from within her laboratory beneath the [[gnarled teahouse]] of the [[Putrid Bog]].
document_data.Description: The potion bottle contained a fat, juicy parasite sitting at the bottom of its liquid contents.
document_data.Powers: This potion gave an individual a great boost of strength for a few minutes' time, after which they began to feel normal again. Unfortunately their strength was sapped from them after their next night's rest, an affliction that lasted indefinitely.
document_data.History: Only one known bottle of ''Broken Promises'' could be found as of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
